property.name: geode.installation.file.path
property.description: File path of Geode installation file (.tar.gz).

property.name: geode.installation.file.download.url
property.description: If the {geode.installation.file.path tarball} doesn't exist use this URL to download it from specified HTTP server.

property.name: geode.user
property.description: Linux user account for geode install and processes.

property.name: geode.group
property.description: Linux group for geode install and processes.

property.name: geode.locator.port
property.description: Port for Geode locator. Default is 10334. When installing in a cloud environment (e.g., AWS, GCE, Azure, etc.), please make sure this port is properly configured in your firewall policy.

property.name: geode.server.port
property.description: Port for Geode server. Default is 10334. When installing in a cloud environment (e.g., AWS, GCE, Azure, etc.), please make sure this port is properly configured in your firewall policy.

property.name: geode.locator.properties.file
property.value: jmx-manager=true jmx-manager-start=true http-service-port=7070 jmx-manager-port=1099 membership-port-range=2303-2308 memcached-port=8118 tcp-port=8161 log-level=info statistic-sampling-enabled=true

property.name: geode.server.properties.file
property.value: jmx-manager=false jmx-manager-start=false log-level=info membership-port-range=2303-2308 memcached-port=8118 tcp-port=8161 statistic-sampling-enabled=true http-service-port=8484 start-dev-rest-api=true
